UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the TypeRush application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

highestWPM.description: The user's highest recorded typing speed (words per minute).

gamesPlayed.description: The total number of games the user has played.

Game.title: Game
Game.description: Represents a single game played by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Game entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who played the game.

score.description: The score (WPM) achieved in the game.

timestamp.description: The timestamp indicating when the game was played.

LeaderboardEntry.title: LeaderboardEntry
LeaderboardEntry.description: Represents a single entry on the leaderboard.

id.description: Unique identifier for the LeaderboardEntry entity.

username.description: The username associated with this leaderboard entry.

score.description: The score achieved by the user.

timestamp.description: The timestamp indicating when the score was achieved.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Race entity.

host.description: The username of the user who created the race.

status.description: The current status of the race (e.g., 'waiting', 'running', 'finished').

paragraphText.description: The text snippet used for the race.

startTime.description: The server timestamp when the race started.

winnerId.description: The userId of the player who won the race.

playerCount.description: The number of players currently in the race.

Player.title: Player
Player.description: Represents a player's state within a specific race.

photoURL.description: URL of the player's profile picture.

progress.description: The player's typing progress as a percentage (0-100).

wpm.description: The player's current typing speed (words per minute).

finishedTime.description: The time in seconds it took the player to finish the race.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can access their profile. Includes 'id', 'username', 'email', 'highestWPM', and 'gamesPlayed'.
Stores the history of games played by a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can access their own game history.
Stores leaderboard entries. Includes denormalized 'username' from UserProfile for authorization independence. Includes 'userId', 'username', 'score', and 'timestamp'.
Stores documents for multiplayer races. Publicly readable, with write access controlled by ownership and race status.
Stores player-specific data within a race. Only the player themselves can create or update their own document.
